net.semanticmetadata.lire.indexers.tools

Class ProximityHashingIndexor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.indexers.tools.ProximityHashingIndexor

  • public class ProximityHashingIndexor
extends java.lang.Object
    The Indexor (yes, I know the hashFunctionsFileName sounds weird, but it should match the Extractor class, and not the Lucene Indexing classes) reads data files created by the Extractor. They are added to a given index. Note that the index is not overwritten, but the documents are appended. This one implements the proximity approach "metric spaces" based on the work of Giuseppe Amato. See Gennaro, Claudio, et al. "An approach to content-based image retrieval based on the Lucene search engine library." Research and Advanced Technology for Digital Libraries. Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 2010. 55-66.
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at Date: 08.03.13 Time: 14:28
